TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MappedFolderType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: 指定 SharePoint 项目中映射文件夹的类型。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType>以下方案中的值：
- 若要指定类型的映射的文件夹，你想要通过使用创建<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolderCollection.Add%28Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType%29?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolderCollection.Add%28Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。
- 若要确定类型映射的文件夹，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder>对象所表示。 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A>属性来确定这。
当你通过创建映射的文件夹<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolderCollection.Add%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolderCollection.Add%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A>属性的新映射的文件夹会自动设置基于你指定的相对路径。 如果指定不对应的标准映射的文件夹位置，请之一的相对路径<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A>新映射的文件夹的属性具有值<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType ControlTemplates = int32(1)

Docs.summary: 指示映射到 {SharePointRoot}\Template\ControlTemplates 的映射文件夹。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType Images = int32(2)

Docs.summary: 指示映射到 {SharePointRoot}\Template\Images 的映射文件夹。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType Layouts = int32(3)

Docs.summary: 指示映射到 {SharePointRoot}\Template\Layouts 的映射文件夹。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType Other = int32(0)

Docs.summary: 此值用于未映射到由其他 值所指定任一文件夹的任何映射文件夹。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType SharePointRoot = int32(4)

Docs.summary: 指示映射到 {SharePointRoot} 的映射文件夹。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType Template = int32(5)

Docs.summary: 指示映射到 {SharePointRoot}\Template 的映射文件夹。
